title: Risk
description: Possible risk potentially encountered during the run of a drilling program or a single string run.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

Preventions.title: Preventions
Preventions.description: A textual description of the steps to prevent this risk

items.title: Risk Response
items.description: Describe a set of action to prevent for a risk or to mitigate its consequences

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Describes the status of the action such as (progress, done, canceled)

Responsibles.title: Responsibles
Responsibles.description: List of the staff responsible to proceed with the response

Deadline.title: Deadline
Deadline.description: Date the response must be completed

UpdateDate.title: Update Date
UpdateDate.description: Date the description of the response has been updated.

Cause.title: Cause
Cause.description: A textual description of the cause of this risk

Consequence.title: Consequence
Consequence.description: A textual description of the consequence of this risk occurring

ConsequenceCategoryID.title: Consequence Category ID
ConsequenceCategoryID.description: Reference to the name of the category of the loss - equivalent to the "ConsequenceCategory" as defined in Bow Tie.
ConsequenceCategoryID.x-osdu-existing-standard: Proposed reference values: Asset - Equipment, Asset - Products, Asset - 3rd Party, Asset - Computer, Automotive Heavy, Automotive Light, Environment - Accidental Discharge, Environment - Physical Damage, Environment - Sanctions and Scrutiny, Environment - Inappropriate Disposal, Fine/Penalties, Information - Client, Information - Schlumberger, Information - 3rd Party, NPT Client, NPT Schlumberger, NPT 3rd Party, Personnel Injury, Personnel Occupational Illness, Personnel Non-Occupational Illness, Process, Reputation, Revenue

ConsequenceSubCategoryID.title: Consequence SubCategory ID
ConsequenceSubCategoryID.description: References the consequence sub-category of the risk. Possible effects arising were a risk event to occur.

ResidualSeverity.title: Residual Severity
ResidualSeverity.description:
Severity Level of the Risk. 
					Values of 1 through 5 with 1 being the lowest.

ResidualProbability.title: Residual Probability
ResidualProbability.description:
Probability Level of the Risk.
					Values of 1 through 5 with 1 being the lowest.

RiskAssociatedObjectIDs.title: Risk Associated Object IDs
RiskAssociatedObjectIDs.description: Array of identifiers from the risk to related objects or documents (such as BHA, Mud design, Activity plans...)

PublicationDate.title: Publication Date
PublicationDate.description: Date a resource is formed outside of OSDU before loading

InitialSeverity.title: Initial Severity
InitialSeverity.description:
Initial Severity Level of the Risk. 
					Values of 1 through 5 with 1 being the lowest.

InitialProbability.title: Initial Probability
InitialProbability.description:
Initial Probability Level of the Risk.
					Values of 1 through 5 with 1 being the lowest.

InitialRiskScore.title: Initial Risk Score
InitialRiskScore.description:
Score computed as of "Pre-Mitigation" which is the combination of : 
Initial Severity * Initial Probability 
Values of 1 through 25 with 1 being the lowest.

ResidualRiskScore.title: Residual Risk
ResidualRiskScore.description:
Score computed as of "Post-Mitigation" which is the combination of : 
Combination of Residual Severity * Residual Probability
Values of 1 through 25 with 1 being the lowest.

RiskHierarchyLevelID.title: Risk Hierarchy Level ID
RiskHierarchyLevelID.description: Describes the Hierarchy Level the risk is applying to (such as Well, Field, Global…)

RiskCategoryID.title: Risk Category ID
RiskCategoryID.description: General category of the described risk such as "Reservoir", "Overburden", "Life of Well", "Drilling", "Completion" or "Opportunity"

RiskSubCategoryID.title: Risk Sub Category ID
RiskSubCategoryID.description: Detailed category of the described risk such as "BOP", "Casing", "Cementing", "Riserless"

RiskDisciplineID.title: Risk Discipline ID
RiskDisciplineID.description: Describes the "discipline" that may be affected by the risk

Mitigations.title: Mitigations
Mitigations.description: Describes the measure or measures that may be applied to the risk to mitigate its consequences

items.title: Risk Response
items.description: Describe a set of action to prevent for a risk or to mitigate its consequences

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Describes the status of the action such as (progress, done, canceled)

Responsibles.title: Responsibles
Responsibles.description: List of the staff responsible to proceed with the response

Deadline.title: Deadline
Deadline.description: Date the response must be completed

UpdateDate.title: Update Date
UpdateDate.description: Date the description of the response has been updated.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The common or preferred name for a risk

EffectiveDateTime.title: Effective Data Time
EffectiveDateTime.description: Date and time that activities started.

TerminationDateTime.title: Termination Date Time
TerminationDateTime.description: Date and time that activities were completed.

AffectedPersonnel.title: Affected Personnel
AffectedPersonnel.description: Describes the entity that may be affected by the risk

RiskResponsibles.title: Responsibles
RiskResponsibles.description: Describes the responsibles (person/role/entity) for managing the risk

ExtendedRiskCategory.title: Extended Risk Category
ExtendedRiskCategory.description: Custom string to further extend the risk categorization

NetSeverity.title: Net Severity
NetSeverity.description: Assumes PREVENTION AND MITIGATION barriers are in place to manage the risk event

NetProbability.title: Net Probability
NetProbability.description: Assumes PREVENTION AND MITIGATION barriers are in place to manage the risk event

NetRiskScore.title: Net Score
NetRiskScore.description:
Assumes PREVENTION AND MITIGATION barriers are in place to manage the risk event  which is the combination of : 
Net Severity * Net Probability

RelatedRiskSetID.title: Related RiskSet ID
RelatedRiskSetID.description: Identifier of the Related Risks collection

RiskStartDepth.title: Risk Start Depth
RiskStartDepth.description: start depth of the risk interval. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

RiskEndDepth.title: Risk End Depth
RiskEndDepth.description: end depth of the risk interval. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.
